Buffalo Wings.description: Chicken Wings smothered in our home made Buffalo sauce!

Mozzarella Sticks.description: Mozzarella dipped in our signature Beer Battered breading!

Cold Cut Trio.description: Sliced ham, turkey and salami on wheat bread. Served with American cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and red onions.

Italian Sub.description: A mix of ham, postrami, and salami served on Italian Herb Bread with lettuce, tomatoes, bell peppers and our home made italian spread.

Pizza Sub.description: Slices of pepperoni piled high on white bread, smothered in marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.

Chicken Bacon Ranch.description: Chicken grilled to perfection, crispy fried bacon crumbled into ranch sauce and spread across the chicken on wheat bread.

Ice Cream Sandwhiches.description: Vanilla ice cream smushed between freshly baked cocoa cookies!

Hot Fudge Sundae.description: Ice cream smothered in hot fudge and topped with cherries.

Alibaba.description: Tea mixed with generous amounts of rum, vodka and everclear
